page.title: 04Adult Leisure Time P.J.Todd
page.content: During my leisure time I enjoy many varied activities and pursuits. I play cricket and badminton for local teams. I enjoy the competitive nature of sport. It is also a means of keeping reasonably fit and having a social life away from work colleagues.I also enjoy gardening particularly vegetable growing. There is a sense of achievement in producing your own fresh vegetables, with that ditinctive "home grown" flavour. Breeding Bantums is a hobby I have pursued since childhood. Bantums are small domestic fowl with a wide range of shape and colour characteristics. Although they are a hobby they are, never the less,profitable producing a ready supply of eggs, they also make very fine table birds and in addition surplus stock can be sold.
